page.title: 14Hatfield Broad Oak Clubs: 1
page.content: A wide variety of clubs and local organisations offer a choice of leisure and recreative activities to the villagers. For the young these range from the various branches of the scout/guide organisation to the church youth club,the church choir, bell- ringing and drama (HBO junior players). For adults there are lectures run by the Workers' Educational Association, the Women's Institute, a Ladies Club, regular whist drives and darts teams based on the local public houses. Annual events include the church flower festival, which involves more or less the whole community, a barn dance and various other dances, discos and parties run by individual organisations. The majority of the larger events take place at the village hall.
